content: {"locationId": "6584", "organizationId": "5598", "name": "Mount Saint Peter", "address1": "100 Freeport Rd.", "address2": "", "city": "New Kensington", "state": "PA", "zipCode": "15068", "country": null, "phone": "724-335-9877", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "40.5636327", "longitude": "-79.7608965", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Westmoreland", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "The food pantry distributes in a church parking lot and operates from 1 to 3 p.m. on the first Wednesday of the month for Westmoreland County residents. Do not arrive before 12:15 pm. The line is shorter between 2 and 3 p.m.  Before arriving, please make space in your trunk so your food will fit.  Pantry is a drive-through. Drive around to the back of the church. Follow the signs to form single or double lines of vehicles as the signs and cones suggest.   Please remain in your vehicle as volunteers will check you in and will also place the items into your trunk.  Exit the line to the right, and then make a left up the alley.  If you are walk-up, please let a volunteer know you have arrived, and someone will be with you shortly for check-in.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "724-335-9877", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Drive Through, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, Senior Food Box, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Bread, Canned fruits & vegetables and other household staple items, Fresh milk, Various fresh produce items, Various meat items", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 47, "regionName": "Westmoreland Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "229d48bd-dcc1-4495-91d4-ca4ecdeb578f.png", "website": "https://westmorelandfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Wednesday 1:00 PM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
